Welcome to Abdullahi's Portfolio

We have a personalised, evidence-based physiotherapy service. Exceptional care is provided from initial consultation throughout your physiotherapy journey.

About Me

I am Abdullahi, a dedicated physiotherapist. My goal is to empower clients through education and personalized care.

I believe in a holistic approach that not only treats the injury but also improves overall well-being, considering physical, mental, and social health aspects.

Together, we'll work towards your recovery and long-term health, helping you achieve your wellness goals.

3+

Experience

I have 2 years of experience treating a variety of conditions in private practice, including musculoskeletal issues, post-surgical rehab, and sports injuries.

In my community role, I focus on NDIS clients and seniors, adapting treatments creatively to suit each individual's needs.

Professional Timeline

Bachelor of Health Sciences

Completed a Bachelor of Health Sciences with a focus on Human Physiology and Anatomy at La Trobe University.

2017-2019

Master of Physiotherapy Practice

Earned a Master of Physiotherapy Practice from La Trobe University, enhancing clinical skills and knowledge.

2020-2021

Private Practice Experience

Gained experience in private practice at Physiochoice and Head2Toe, handling various musculoskeletal cases and sports injuries.

2021-Present

Community Physiotherapy

Worked with clients with disabilities and seniors in community roles, focusing on NDIS clients and aged care.

2022-Present

Certification in Dry Needling

Certified in dry needling/acupuncture with two years of experience in the technique.

2023

Specialized Techniques and Awards

Specialized in Mulligan's treatment philosophy for cervical conditions and received recognition for contributions in physiotherapy.

2023

My Physiotherapy Services

At our clinic, we offer a variety of physiotherapy services designed to help you recover and maintain optimal health. Whether you need manual therapy, exercise prescriptions, or specialized neurological rehabilitation, our skilled professionals are here to support you.

Manual Therapy

Skilled hands-on techniques to alleviate pain and promote healing.

Exercise Prescription

Evidence based programs to strengthen muscles and manage pain.

Pain Management

Evidence-based strategies to manage acute and chronic pain effectively.

Neurological Rehab

Specialized techniques to help patients with neurological conditions such as stroke & parkinson's.

Sports Therapy

Targeted treatment and training to optimize athletic performance.

Spinal rehabilitation

Techniques to improve posture, reduce pain, and prevent injuries of the spine.
